Description: This PRS S2 Studio is in excellent condition. I purchased the guitar new last summer. It looks, plays and sounds great. I really like the bridge pickup in either mode (humbucker or split), and you can get a convincing Strat tone by selecting the bridge and middle pickups combined. The only issues that I am aware of are light surface scratches. I'll ship to the winning bidder for $85 fully insured anywhere in the continental US. Here are a few more details from the PRS website: The S2 Studio takes the Standard 22 platform into new sonic territory with a single/single/hum pickup configuration and updated switching system. This versatile setup allows for a whole new scope of sounds that are only possible with a three pickup guitar, whether you’re looking for punchy singlecoils, vintage scooped tones, or the chunky kick of a bridge humbucker (that can still be split to singlecoils via the push/pull tone knob for a three single coil set up). With eight combinations in all, the S2 Studio covers classic tones but maintains a unique voice making it a perfect “desert island” guitar. Switching Positions: Position One: Treble humbucker (Treble singlecoil with push/pull tone control in up position) Position Two: Treble humbucker and middle singlecoilPosition Three: Treble humbucker and Bass singlecoil PPosition Four: Middle singlecoil and Bass singlecoil Position Five: Bass singlecoil
Title: Paul Reed Smith PRS S2 Studio - Frost Blue Metallic - Excellent
